Article Title: ‚ÄúI would like to play‚Äù: Deion Sanders champions Colorado‚Äôs Spring Game as other programs abandon tradition
Article Text:
Image via Imagn Images

Colorado‚Äôs Spring Game set for April 19, nationally broadcast

Deion Sanders wants more than just a scrimmage



As many major college football programs move away from traditional spring games, Deion Sanders is taking a different approach at Colorado. While powerhouse programs like Texas, USC, and Nebraska have canceled their 2025 spring games, Sanders is doubling down on the importance of the annual showcase, ensuring that Colorado‚Äôs will not only take place but also receive national television coverage.Unlike Texas coach Steve Sarkisian, who prefers an NFL-style spring practice, and Nebraska‚Äôs Matt Rhule, who sees spring games as an opportunity for rival coaches to scout players in the transfer portal era, Sanders is keeping the event alive in Boulder.Colorado‚Äôs 2025 spring game is set for April 19 at Folsom Field and will air on ESPN2, ensuring the Buffaloes remain in the national spotlight. This marks the second time in three years that Colorado‚Äôs spring game will be nationally televised. The 2023 edition, Sanders‚Äô first as head coach, was the only spring game that aired on ESPN‚Äôs main network, drawing an impressive 551,000 viewers.In true Coach Prime fashion, Deion Sanders isn‚Äôt just content with keeping the spring game alive‚Äîhe wants to take it a step further by introducing a competitive element."We got to sell this thing out and pack this thing, because the way the trend is going, you never know if this is going to be the last spring game," Sanders said at a press conference. "I don‚Äôt believe in that, and I don‚Äôt really want to condone that, and I would like to play‚ÄîI actually would like to play against another team this spring, that‚Äôs what I‚Äôm trying to do."Syracuse head coach Fran Brown responded on Twitter, expressing interest in making Sanders‚Äô vision a reality. However, current NCAA rules prohibit teams from playing against one another in the spring.Despite this restriction, Sanders remains focused on pushing for change. ‚ÄúI would like to style it like the pros,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúI would like to practice against someone for a few days, and then you have the spring game. I think the public will be satisfied with that tremendously.‚ÄùUnder Sanders‚Äô leadership, fan engagement in Colorado football has skyrocketed. In 2023, Colorado sold out its spring game for the first time, drawing more than 47,000 fans‚Äîan astonishing leap from the 1,100 fans who attended in 2022. Last year, the Buffaloes saw an estimated 28,000 fans attend, further solidifying the growing excitement around the program.Also Read: Aaron Rodgers could retire if his preferred NFL team doesn‚Äôt come forward with an offer: How it will impact the QB market As other schools move away from spring games, Sanders is not just keeping the tradition alive‚Äîhe‚Äôs looking to elevate it. Whether or not the NCAA will allow teams to scrimmage against each other in the future remains to be seen, but one thing is clear: Coach Prime is determined to keep Colorado in the national conversation.
Article Summary: Colorado‚Äôs 2025 spring game is set for april 19 at folsom field and will air on espn2. The 2023 edition, sanders‚Äô first as head coach, was the only spring game that aired on espn's main network, drawing an impressive 551,000 viewers. Current ncaa rules prohibit teams from playing against one another in the spring.

Article Title: Wayne Gretzky's daughter Emma Gretzky celebrates boyfriend Stone Eby‚Äôs 22nd birthday with heartfelt tribute
Article Text:
Image via Instagram

Emma Gretzky shares special birthday moments of her boyfriend on Instagram

A strong relationship rooted in shared college days

Wayne Gretzky ‚Äôs youngest daughter, Emma Gretzky , recently gave fans a glimpse into her boyfriend Stone Eby ‚Äôs 22nd birthday celebration. The couple, who have been together for over two years, marked the special occasion with an intimate gathering filled with sweet moments.Taking to Instagram, Emma posted a heartfelt tribute to Stone, sharing a series of photos from the celebration. The first picture featured Eby blowing out candles on a birthday cake alongside a young girl, who is likely Emma‚Äôs niece.‚ÄúHappy birthday @stoneeby! I love you,‚Äù Emma wrote in the caption. She also gave a shoutout to her sister, adding, ‚ÄúEarly bday celebration thanks to Sissy and her amazing cake.‚ÄùAnother photo showed the couple posing for a mirror selfie in cowboy hats and matching jeans, reflecting their close bond. Emma simply captioned it, ‚Äú22!!!‚Äù and tagged Eby. She also shared a stylish black-and-white picture of the two, captioned with three heart emojis.Emma and Stone‚Äôs relationship dates back to their time at Southern Methodist University (SMU). Emma played for the SMU tennis team, while Stone was a college football player for the Mustangs. Their shared athletic background has been a strong foundation for their relationship.Last year, Stone joined Emma and her family to celebrate her 21st birthday at a glamorous Casino Royale-themed party. The star-studded event included her parents, Wayne and Janet Gretzky, her older sister Paulina, Paulina‚Äôs husband and pro golfer Dustin Johnson, and her brother Trevor. Paulina later shared a carousel of images from the night on Instagram.The Gretzky family has been busy with celebrations. Emma recently attended a puppy yoga session in honor of her friend and fellow SMU alum Cat Holt‚Äôs birthday. Meanwhile, Wayne Gretzky celebrated his own birthday in style, attending the AFC Championship game at Arrowhead Stadium on January 26.Joined by family and friends, the hockey legend watched the Kansas City Chiefs defeat the Buffalo Bills to secure their third straight Super Bowl appearance. Paulina shared behind-the-scenes moments from the trip, including a private jet decked out with balloons and streamers, as well as nostalgic throwback photos of her father.Also Read: Did Wayne Gretzky‚Äôs friendship with Donald Trump tarnish his legacy? ‚ÄúHappy birthday to the best dad. Love you forever ... ur magoo,‚Äù Paulina wrote in a heartfelt caption. With family celebrations and milestones continuing, the Gretzky family remains as close-knit as ever.
Article Summary: Emma gretzky shared a series of photos from her boyfriend stone eby's 22nd birthday celebration. The couple have been together for over two years. Emma and stone‚Äôs relationship dates back to their time at southern methodist university (smu)

Article Title: Michael Strahan‚Äôs daughter Isabella calls out sister‚Äôs 'unsupportive' behavior during challenging cancer recovery journey
Article Text:
Credit: Instagram/isabellastrahan

Michael Strahan‚Äôs daughter opens up about feeling unsupported by her sister during cancer recovery journey



Isabella Strahan, daughter of NFL legend Michael Strahan, is proving to be a true warrior after overcoming a grueling nine-month battle with brain cancer. Now, as she approaches her one-year cancer-free milestone, Isabella is embracing life with renewed strength alongside her twin sister, Sophia. Her inspiring journey reflects resilience, sisterly bonds, and the power of a positive mindset.On a recent episode of the Battlefront podcast, Isabella Strahan shared an amusing yet surprising revelation about Sophia‚Äôs support‚Äîor lack thereof‚Äîduring her recovery. ‚ÄúKinda just vlogging reflecting back. I would always love to follow it on the TV at home. I don‚Äôt think that Sophia has seen any of my vlogs, so yeah, she is like the number one ‚Äòunsupporter‚Äô over here. It‚Äôs be like, ‚ÄòHow could you not have seen a single one‚Äô?‚Äù Isabella joked. While it‚Äôs hard to imagine fighting cancer without full support from a twin, it‚Äôs clear that their relationship is built on playful honesty and deep love.After receiving her diagnosis in October 2023, Isabella decided to open up about her health journey through a YouTube vlog channel. Her candid updates not only helped her process the challenges of cancer treatment but also inspired countless followers. Though Sophia may not have watched the vlogs, her real-life support has been unwavering. The twins‚Äô bond is more evident than ever as they face life‚Äôs ups and downs together.On March 12th, Isabella took to her Instagram story to share a heartwarming moment with Sophia during a much-needed ‚Äúsister session.‚Äù The Strahan sisters were seen crushing a kettlebell deadlift workout while sporting stylish Alo Yoga gear. Isabella looked fierce in her black gym wear, while Sophia kept it cool in a gray outfit. What stood out most, however, was Isabella‚Äôs radiant smile and the sight of her curls growing back beautifully‚Äîa visible sign of her recovery. It‚Äôs inspiring to see her reclaim her strength after such a tough battle.Fitness has become a central part of Isabella‚Äôs post-recovery routine, with Sophia right by her side. Their shared workouts are more than just a way to stay fit‚Äîthey symbolize the strength and support that have defined Isabella‚Äôs comeback. With Sophia as her rock, Isabella is stepping into this new chapter of life with confidence and grace. Her journey from battling cancer to thriving alongside her sister is a powerful testament to resilience, love, and the unbreakable bond between siblings.Also Read: NFL teams make history with unprecedented move ahead of 2025 Draft after 55 years Meanwhile, Sophia Strahan recently shared with PEOPLE magazine how she became a pillar of strength for her twin sister, Isabella, during her battle with brain cancer. Sophia‚Äôs goal was to help Isabella feel like a typical young adult, even while undergoing intense treatment.Reflecting on their conversations, Sophia recalled, "Something she would say to me quite a few times was like, 'I just don't feel normal. I want to feel normal. Nothing about my life right now is normal.'" Sophia explained, "I think something that I tried to do best was to make her feel normal." Her unwavering support and efforts to create a sense of normalcy tells us the powerful bond between the Strahan sisters during Isabella‚Äôs challenging journey.
Article Summary: Michael strahan's daughter, isabella, is one year cancer-free. Isabella opened up about her recovery on her youtube vlog channel. Her twin sister, sophia, has been a pillar of strength for isabella during her recovery. The sisters recently shared a photo of a "sister session"

Article Title: Donna Kelce‚Äôs health battle and its impact on Travis Kelce‚Äôs retirement decision
Article Text:
Imag via MEGA

Donna Kelce‚Äôs health struggles highlight importance of support systems



Travis Kelce, the NFL's most well-known star, has been the subject of debate regarding his future in football. While fans wonder if he will retire, fresh reports indicate that personal reasons, such as his mother Donna Kelce's health issues, are taking center stage in his decision-making.The Kansas City Chiefs tight end, Travis Kelce has never been shy about his tight-knit relationship with his family, especially his mom, Donna Kelce. She recently shared about a difficult health condition that has touched their family deeply. Though details are not made public, it's clear that Donna's condition has given Kelce's already grueling career an added emotional burden.Her fight is a harsh reminder of the need to put both physical and emotional health first. The NFL has come a long way in advancing health awareness, from pushing regular medical check-ups to developing mental health programs. Kelce, through his own experiences, is also increasing the call for these conversations.Travis Kelce's retirement has become a burning issue, particularly following another Super Bowl win with the Chiefs. Whereas his physicality in the sport has been questioned extensively, now his mental and emotional health become important factors.Balancing the constant demands of professional football with personal issues is no simple matter. Kelce's case highlights how deeply personal issues can drive an athlete's career choices. Whether it's injuries, family obligations, or mental exhaustion, these issues weigh heavily in deciding how long to remain in the game.Mental health activism in sport has gained pace over the past decade, with great numbers of athletes openly discussing their dilemmas. Kelce's case further reiterates the need for support mechanisms, both team-based and family-based, to allow players to make choices that promote their well-being.Travis Kelce's impact is felt off the field as well. As a vocal mental health advocate, he has contributed to mainstreaming discussions on emotional resilience and psychological well-being in high-stress settings. His possible retirement, prompted by personal and family struggles, adds further impetus for robust mental health support systems in professional sport.Also Read: ‚ÄúI'm 95 percent of the reason‚Äù: Rashee Rice reveals that not Taylor Swift but he convinced Travis Kelce not to retire As this situation plays out, it is a poignant reminder that even the largest of stars have their own demons. Whether Travis Kelce decides to prolong his career or retire, his path will be one that continues to fuel debate about the value of putting health first‚Äîboth physical and mental.
Article Summary: Kansas city chiefs tight end travis kelce has been the subject of debate regarding his future in football. Fresh reports indicate that personal reasons, such as his mother donna kelce's health issues, are taking center stage in his decision-making. Her fight is a harsh reminder of the need to put both physical and emotional health first.

Article Title: Is MLB The Show 25 available on Xbox Game Pass?
Article Text:
(Image Via - MLBTheShow‚Äôs ‚ÄúX‚Äù Account)

Will MLB The Show 25 be available on Xbox Game Pass?



What does this move mean for the Xbox Players?



The fans of MLB The Show were quite thrilled when the series made its debut in 2021 on Xbox Game Pass. It allowed the subscribers to play the game without any additional cost. The trend then continued with MLB The Show 22, 23, and 24. But now, as the series is closer to its latest release, the highly anticipated game fans, especially the Xbox Game Pass subscribers, are quite eager to play the game and wish to know how they can access MLB The Show 25 .While there has been no official explanation from MLB or Sony since 2021, it‚Äôs the first time that MLB The Show 25 won‚Äôt be available on Xbox Game Pass. So, the fans cannot play it, either at launch or during 2025. Breaking the series' 4-year tradition, the news has been confirmed by MLB and Sony that the game will skip the subscription services this year entirely. It will require the players to purchase the game outright. The official statement from MLB The Show 25 developers read, ‚ÄúThe game will not be on platform subscription services in 2025."The shift here likely reflects the evolving licensing strategies. The move has left the fans disappointed, especially those who got accustomed to the game access through the Game Pass Subscription. The previous titles, including MLB The Show 24, will be removed from the Game Pass by late March 2025 too. It signals the clear departure of the series from its early partnership with the Xbox subscription service.For the Xbox users, it means the gamers will have to pay $69.99 full price for the Standard Edition. They can even opt for Digital Deluxe Edition for $79.99. It comes with early access, starting March 14, 2025. The Collector‚Äôs Edition is priced at $229.99. It will offer the players additional physical goodies like a steelbook case and exclusive items. But it's a steep investment for most players.MLB The Show 25 absence on Game Pass raises questions about the game‚Äôs accessibility, especially for casual players who might not wish to spend $70 on a single game. However, the multi-platform availability of the game ensures that players on PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch can still enjoy the latest installment, albeit at the full price.
Article Summary: Mlb the show 25 won‚Äôt be available on xbox game pass. The game will require the players to purchase the game outright. The move has left the fans disappointed, especially those who got accustomed to the game access through the game pass subscription. It signals the clear departure of the series from its early partnership with the xbox subscription service.

Article Title: 'Pakistan should have planned better': Tyron Henderson on PSL-IPL clash
Article Text:
Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

IPL: How will GT, LSG, DC, PBKS, RR fare? Greenstone Lobo predicts

The Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) recently served a legal notice to South African all-rounder Corbin Bosch after he withdrew from the Pakistan Super League (PSL) 2025 to represent Mumbai Indians (MI) in the upcoming edition of the Indian Premier League IPL ). Both tournaments are set to overlap, drawing increased attention to the issue, as the 30-year-old had earlier been signed by PSL franchise Peshawar Zalmi in the Diamond Category during the player draft held in January.Former South African all-rounder Tyron Henderson , who represented Rajasthan Royals (RR) in IPL 2009, termed the IPL the biggest T20 tournament in the world and added that the PSL should have been planned better."A player does have the right to pull out of a tournament. It is simply a bitter pill to swallow for Pakistan, as he has withdrawn to play in the IPL. The relationship between both nations is not great to begin with," Henderson said in an interaction with TOI."IPL is definitely the tournament to be a part of, considering it is the biggest T20 league in the world. Pakistan is trying to protect its competition, but they should not have scheduled the PSL at the same time as the IPL," he further added.Bosch has joined MI as a replacement for South African all-rounder Lizaad Williams."The player has been asked to justify his actions in withdrawing from his professional and contractual commitments. The PCB management has also outlined the repercussions of his departure from the league and expects his response within the stipulated time frame," stated the PCB in a press release regarding the legal notice to Bosch.Both tournaments will take place during the same window for the first time ever.While the upcoming PSL season is set to run from April 11 to May 25, IPL 2025 will be held from March 22 to May 25.
Article Summary: Corbin bosch has withdrawn from the pakistan super league (psl) 2025 to represent mumbai indians (mi) in the upcoming edition of the indian premier league ipl. Bosch had earlier been signed by psl franchise peshawar zalmi in the diamond category during the player draft held in january.

Article Title: NBA Offseason Rumors: Golden State Warriors could bag $11.1 million Philadelphia 76ers guard to bolster team's defensive end; Stephen Curry's fatigue exposing crucial roster flaws?
Article Text:
Philadelphia 76ers guard Quentin Grimes (5) scores past Golden State Warriors guard Moses Moody (4) during the first quarter at Wells Fargo Center. (Image via Bill Streicher-Imagn Images).

Quentin Grimes (Image via Getty)

The Golden State Warriors, fresh off a disappointing 114-105 loss to the Denver Nuggets, are in dire need of a scoring boost. With Stephen Curry struggling and the team shooting a dismal 24.2% from three-point range, the spotlight has turned to potential summer signings. One name that stands out is Philadelphia 76ers guard Quentin Grimes, who has been on an offensive tear, averaging 34.5 points over his last five games.Grimes, a 24-year-old guard, recently dropped 46 points against the Houston Rockets, showcasing his ability to perform against elite defenses. This performance wasn‚Äôt an anomaly. Since being traded to the 76ers on Feb. 4, Quentin Grimes has been a consistent scoring threat, shooting 53.2% from the field and 42.5% from beyond the arc. His recent form has made him one of the most talked-about players in the league.The Golden State Warriors are no strangers to Grimes‚Äô capabilities. On Mar. 1, he scored a career-high 44 points against them in a 126-119 victory. His impending status as a restricted free agent this summer makes him an attractive target for Golden State, who are looking to maximize the remaining prime years of Curry and Jimmy Butler However, acquiring Quentin Grimes won‚Äôt be straightforward. The Warriors are tight on cap space, and the future of restricted free agent Jonathan Kuminga adds another layer of complexity. If Kuminga leaves for a lucrative deal, it could free up the necessary funds to pursue Grimes. But as of now, this remains a speculative scenario.Quentin Grimes‚Äô potential fit with the Golden State Warriors is intriguing. As a career 37.8% three-point shooter, he could complement Curry‚Äôs playstyle, providing another reliable distance threat. His ability to create his own shot and drive to the basket would add a new dimension to Golden State‚Äôs offense.Also read: NBA Offseason Rumors: Golden State Warriors could acquire $94,500,000 Brooklyn Nets forward to support Jimmy Butler and Stephen Curry; perfect to form a Warriors BIG 3? While the financial hurdles make this potential signing unlikely, the idea of Quentin Grimes joining the Warriors is tantalizing. His offensive prowess could be the spark Golden State needs to return to championship contention. As the summer approaches, all eyes will be on how the Golden State Warriors navigate their cap space and whether they can turn this fantasy into reality.
Article Summary: The golden state warriors are in dire need of a scoring boost. Quentin grimes has been on an offensive tear, averaging 34.5 points over his last five games. The warriors are tight on cap space, and the future of restricted free agent jonathan kuminga adds another layer of complexity. As of now, this remains a speculative scenario.

Article Title: NBA Summer Trade Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers could acquire $40.2 million Dallas Mavericks center during free agency; Dalton Knecht key trade asset?
Article Text:
Dallas Mavericks forward Anthony Davis (left) reacts with Los Angeles Lakers guard Dalton Knecht (right) after the game at Crypto.com Arena (Image via Gary A. Vasquez-Imagn Images)

Daniel Gafford (Image via Getty)

‚ÄúGafford doesn‚Äôt receive enough praise for his stable play on both ends,‚Äù The Los Angeles Lakers are reportedly considering a bold move to bolster their frontcourt by trading star rookie Dalton Knecht for Dallas Mavericks ‚Äô center Daniel Gafford. This potential trade, as suggested by Bleacher Report‚Äôs Eric Pincus , could address the Lakers‚Äô ongoing struggles in the low post.Despite commendable efforts from Alex Len and Jaxson Hayes, the Los Angeles Lakers‚Äô frontcourt has shown noticeable limitations this season. Gafford, an underrated but impactful player, could provide the stability and energy the team desperately needs. The 26-year-old big man has been a consistent performer for the Mavericks, averaging 12.3 points, 6.9 rebounds, and 1.9 blocks per game this season while shooting an impressive 69.9% from the field.However, Daniel Gafford‚Äôs recent knee injury, which may sideline him for the remainder of the 2024-25 campaign, adds a layer of uncertainty to the trade. His contributions to the Mavericks' march to the NBA Finals the previous season cannot be understated, albeit this setback. Gafford shot 63.4% from the floor and averaged 9.0 points, 5.2 rebounds, and 1.5 blocks per game in 22 postseason games. Dallas' success was largely attributed to his rim-running prowess, defensive presence, and contagious intensity.Pincus noted. While he may not be the most skilled center in the league, his reliability and hustle make him a valuable asset for any team.For the Los Angeles Lakers, trading Knecht, a promising rookie, for Daniel Gafford represents a calculated risk. Knecht has shown flashes of potential, but the Lakers seem willing to part with him to address their immediate needs. Daniel Gafford‚Äôs $40 million contract, while significant, could be a worthwhile investment if he returns to full health and replicates his previous form.This potential trade could reshape both teams‚Äô rosters. The Mavericks would gain a young talent in Knecht, while the Los Angeles Lakers would acquire a proven big man to strengthen their frontcourt. As the offseason approaches, all eyes will be on whether this deal comes to fruition.Also read: NBA Offseason Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers could sign $11,128,042 Sixers shooting guard to support Luka Doncic and LeBron James Let us know in the comments if you feel getting Daniel Gafford during his free agency would be a smart move from the Los Angeles Lakers front office. Would Luka Doncic, LeBron Jamesm, and the rest of the boys in yellow benefit from this potential acquisition?
Article Summary: The los angeles lakers are reportedly considering a bold move to bolster their frontcourt by trading star rookie dalton knecht for dallas mavericks‚Äô center daniel gafford. The 26-year-old big man has been a consistent performer for the mavericks, averaging 12.3 points, 6.9 rebounds, and 1.9 blocks per game this season.

Article Title: IPL 2025 opening ceremony: Disha Patani to dazzle at Eden Gardens
Article Text:
Bollywood star Disha Patani will headline the 2025 IPL opening ceremony at Eden Gardens, Kolkata. This grand event will also feature performances by singers Karan Aujla and Shreya Ghoshal. The IPL 2025 kicks off on March 22 with defending champions Kolkata Knight Riders facing Royal Challengers Bangalore. The tournament will be broadcast live on Star Sports and JioHotstar.

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

IPL: How will GT, LSG, DC, PBKS, RR fare? Greenstone Lobo predicts

NEW DELHI: Bollywood star Disha Patani is set to dazzle at the opening ceremony of the 2025 Indian Premier League. The official X handle of the IPL confirmed the news, announcing that the grand event will take place at the iconic Eden Gardens in Kolkata.‚ÄúWhen it‚Äôs 18 years of IPL, it calls for a dazzling celebration like never before! Who better than the sensational Disha Patani to set the stage ablaze? Don‚Äôt miss the electrifying Opening Ceremony of the #TATAIPL 18,‚Äù read the post.Alongside Disha Patani, singers Karan Aujla and Shreya Ghoshal are also reportedly set to perform at the star-studded event.The ceremony is expected to be attended by ICC chairman Jay Shah and other dignitaries."It's a marquee match with high demand for tickets. Eden Gardens is set to host an opening ceremony after a long time," said CAB president Snehasish Ganguly, while keeping further details under wraps.IPL 2025 is set to kick off on March 22, with Royal Challengers Bangalore taking on Kolkata Knight Riders at the historic Eden Gardens. The tournament will be broadcast live on Star Sports and streamed via JioHotstar.KKR enter the season as defending champions, having clinched the IPL 2024 title under Shreyas Iyer‚Äôs leadership with a victory over Sunrisers Hyderabad in the final.This season, KKR will be led by Ajinkya Rahane.
Article Summary: Bollywood star disha patani will headline the 2025 ipl opening ceremony. This grand event will also feature performances by singers karan aujla and shreya ghoshal. The ipl 2025 kicks off on march 22 with defending champions kolkata knight riders facing royal challengers bangalore.

Article Title: Suryakumar Yadav to lead Mumbai Indians in their IPL 2025 opener with captain Hardik Pandya suspended
Article Text: Mumbai Indians' captain Hardik Pandya's suspension for an over-rate offence last year will be enforced in the their upcoming IPL 2025 season opener against CSK on Sunday, making him unavailable for the match. Suryakumar Yadav will lead in his absence, while the return of Jasprit Bumrah from injury remains uncertain.
Article Summary: Mumbai indians' captain hardik pandya's suspension for an over-rate offence last year will be enforced in the their upcoming ipl 2025 season opener. Suryakumar yadav will lead in his absence, while the return of jasprit bumrah from injury remains uncertain.

Article Title: ‚ÄúSwagatam Sunita‚Äù: Anand Mahindra pens heartfelt message following her 286-day space mission
Article Text: Anand Mahindra expressed relief and admiration upon NASA astronaut Sunita Williams's safe return to Earth. Mahindra called Williams a symbol of courage and recalled a personal encounter with her in 2023. Williams and Butch Wilmore completed a 286-day mission at the ISS, ending with a dramatic splashdown in the Gulf of Mexico.
Article Summary: Anand mahindra expressed relief and admiration upon nasa astronaut sunita williams's safe return to earth. Williams and butch wilmore completed a 286-day mission at the iss, ending with a dramatic splashdown in the gulf of mexico.

Article Title: Eyes on pacers' workload in IPL with England tour soon after
Article Text:
File images of Jasprit Bumrah, left, and Mohammed Shami (Photos: Sportzpics)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

The IPL is the engine that drives India‚Äôs might in world cricket. Over the last 17 years, it has generated mind-numbing revenues besides being a talent-spinning tool in Indian cricket. Yet, it‚Äôs hard to dismiss the franchise-vs-country debate every time the IPL season comes around. Jasprit Bumrah ‚Äôs half-walk-half-hop run-up and Mohammed Shami ‚Äôs smooth approach towards the bowling crease may be a pulsating viewing experience, but there‚Äôs persisting apprehension over their fitness.India‚Äôs Test cricket is at a crossroads currently. With a five-Test tour scheduled to start 25 days after the IPL final, all eyes will be on Bumrah, Shami and other prospective pacers over the next two months. The window would have been shorter had India qualified for the World Test Championship (WTC) final.First things first. Bumrah is yet to obtain a fitness certificate from BCCI medical team at the Centre of Excellence (CoE) in Bengaluru. He hasn‚Äôt taken the field for India since he was forced out due to injury in the first innings of Sydney Test in the first week of Jan.Shami appears to have regained some rhythm during the victorious Champions Trophy campaign after having missed 14 months of cricket.There‚Äôs unease in BCCI over how the medical team has dealt with injuries in the last few years. The board is in process of overhauling its medical team once incumbent head Nitin Patel finishes his notice period this month. The concern is the medical team has been reluctant to be accountable while declaring a player‚Äôs fitness. It‚Äôs often left to selectors who are just told that the player is clinically fit. Whether the player is match-fit is not known.‚ÄòWorkload management‚Äô has been the catchphrase in Indian cricket in the last decade. Yet, the IPL becomes an exception when the players walk into their franchises. The franchises dole out huge money for two months of service. There‚Äôs very little wiggle room once the BCCI clears the players from its CoE (formerly the National Cricket Academy).It‚Äôs not just about Bumrah who is expected to start his IPL campaign for Mumbai Indians in the second week of April. There‚Äôs Akash Deep, who too is undergoing rehab at the CoE. Harshit Rana, identified as India‚Äôs next frontline pacer, has endured a long season going into the IPL.The core focus of workload management has revolved around injury management in the last three years. But the results of treating recurrent injuries have not been inspiring enough.When it comes to the IPL, BCCI‚Äôs role ends once they give all-clear to a player who had earlier reported with an injury. The franchise‚Äôs in-house medical team takes over once the players get into an IPL season. The question is, does BCCI lose all rights over the players? Not really.The introduction of standardised workload management SOPs and wearable devices keep providing all the data. The contracted BCCI players are given Athlete Management System (AMS) vests and the whoop bands (which are worn as watches on the wrists). These devices offer enough data about their physical activities, recovery and sleep cycle. The BCCI trusts its players.Bumrah, per se, has been through all kinds of rehab and training routines. BCCI‚Äôs medical team devises personalised routines according to data of a player. The players adhere to it and routines are usually shared with the franchise‚Äô physios and strength and conditioning coaches.Sources close to India‚Äôs team management and selectors say they trust the judgement of a player whenever the player feels any kind of discomfort.‚ÄúThe players, especially the bowlers, are well educated. They understand what‚Äôs at stake for them. One has to go by the player‚Äôs instinct,‚Äù a BCCI source told TOI.For all the talk about whether a player of Bumrah‚Äôs stature should put his body through the thankless schedule of the IPL, the bottom line says it‚Äôs the BCCI medical team‚Äôs responsibility to ensure a player is always available to play if he is not injured.
Article Summary: Jasprit bumrah is yet to obtain a fitness certificate from bcci medical team at the centre of excellence (coe) in bengaluru. He hasn‚Äôt taken the field for india since he was forced out due to injury in the first innings of sydney test in first week of jan. shami appears to have regained some rhythm during the victorious champions trophy campaign after having missed 14 months of cricket.

Article Title: ‚ÄúWin at a high level?‚Äù: Skip Bayless gets back at Kevin Durant questioning his winning abilities in Phoenix Suns
Article Text:
Skip Bayless and Kevin Durant. Image via: The Skip Bayless Show (screengrab)| Alex Slitz/Getty Images

Skip Bayless

Kevin Durant

Phoenix Suns

Skip Bayless calls out Kevin Durant again as he doubles down on his criticism



Kevin Durant. Image via: Getty Images

Response To Kevin Durant‚Äôs Tweet Fest

Thevsdebate was a headline grabber. The NBA analyst called out theveteran amid the team‚Äôs struggle but Durant‚Äôs response to Bayless got widespread attention. It has been about a week and Bayless added salt to the injury as he called out Durant again in the latest episode of The Skip Bayless Show .NBA superstar Kevin Durant is no stranger to criticism, and this season, his performance with the Phoenix Suns has put him under intense scrutiny. Earlier this month, sports analyst Skip Bayless made a bold statement, claiming Durant looks ‚Äúmentally semi-retired‚Äù and isn‚Äôt fully invested in basketball. Bayless suggested that KD‚Äôs lack of focus is reflected in the Suns‚Äô struggles this season. Durant took to social media with a blunt retort. Quoting a clip from The Skip Bayless Show, he fired back, ‚ÄúF*ck it, we‚Äôre both washed, it was a great run.‚ÄùWhile Durant‚Äôs response was dripping with sarcasm, Bayless wasn‚Äôt done. A week later, he doubled down on his stance, pointing to the Suns‚Äô disastrous defense as proof.‚ÄúSo the other night Kevin Durant tweeted at me as he has, I don't know several times over the last what 12 years, but once again I'm not sure Kevin quite understood what I was saying about him,‚Äù Bayless said.He went on to add, ‚ÄúKevin Durant can still score the basketball with anybody he's still averaging 27 a game and shooting 42% from three but that was not my point I said on this show that the more I watch Kevin Durant play basketball this season at a 36 the more he looks mentally semi-retired as if now his sole focus is on scoring on just playing offense one end of the floor.‚ÄùHe further questions the team‚Äôs struggles despite having several star powers including Durant. The Suns ‚Äúnow rank 27th of 30 teams and defensive efficiency 27th that all starts and ends with the man who still the best player on that team. Kevin Durant who now ranks 212th in individual defensive win shares 212th that's the main reason that Kevin Durant's team is now 31 and 37 and not even in the play in playoffs play in.‚ÄùThe analyst then responded to what KD tweeted back. He said, ‚ÄúMaybe I'm washed.‚Äù However, Bayless hailed Durant‚Äôs physical prowess as the Suns veteran is fit to do wonders for the team. ‚ÄúBut I definitely don't think KD is physically washed his body looks great long and shiny as ever, no loss of quickness or spring that I can see or tell. I'm talking intangibles hunger burning desire to win to sacrifice to do whatever it takes Kevin won his MVP he won his two finals MVPs.‚ÄùBayless further shared that KD who once dominated international basketball, ‚Äúnow he just loves to hoop.‚Äù‚ÄúI don't blame him but he just loves to score to play offense defense, optional. Setting a defensive tone for his team, optional. Leading, optional. Winning optional,‚Äù he added.Also Read: Kevin Durant Destroys Skip Bayless With Hilarious Clapback: Did He Just Call Himself 'Washed'? Bayless‚Äô concern for the Suns and Durant is not negligible as fans of the organization have shown their frustration amid the team‚Äôs struggle.
Article Summary: Nba superstar kevin durant is no stranger to criticism, and this season, his performance with the phoenix suns has put him under intense scrutiny. Earlier this month, sports analyst skip bayless made a bold statement, claiming durant looks ‚Äúmentally semi-retired‚Äù and isn‚Äôt fully invested in basketball.

Article Title: "That was the biggest thing for me": The surprising reason Justin Fields chose the Jets over other NFL teams
Article Text:
Credit: Getty Images

Justin Fields Eyes Fresh Start with New York Jets Under Aaron Glenn‚Äôs Leadership



Why Justin Fields Chose New York üíö

BREAKING: Justin Fields Signs 2-Year Deal with the New York Jets

The New York Jets have secured quarterback Justin Fields in free agency, marking their fourth starting quarterback since 2020 as they gear up for the 2025 season. Fields, who played for the Pittsburgh Steelers last year, now faces the challenge of revitalizing his career with a franchise that has long struggled with quarterback consistency and overall success. Despite the turbulent history, Fields appears optimistic about his fresh start, largely because of the man set to lead him on the sidelines ‚Äî head coach Aaron Glenn .Justin Fields' decision to sign with the Jets was heavily influenced by his relationship with Aaron Glenn, who previously served as the defensive coordinator for the Detroit Lions . Fields and Glenn faced off multiple times in the NFC North when Fields was with the Chicago Bears, and that familiarity played a crucial role in his decision to join New York."I think, No. 1, Coach Glenn," Fields said when asked why he signed with the Jets. "I've played against him early in my career. I know how passionate he is about the game, the way he coaches, the way his players play. So I think that was the biggest thing for me."Fields‚Äô stint in Chicago was marked by inconsistency and constant pressure to perform. After being drafted 11th overall in 2021, he posted a 10-28 record with the Bears, throwing 40 touchdowns against 30 interceptions while completing 60% of his passes. His tenure ended when the Bears drafted Caleb Williams, forcing Fields to find a new home in Pittsburgh. However, his time with the Steelers was brief and unsteady. After filling in for an injured Russell Wilson early last season, Fields was relegated to a backup role once Wilson returned, despite showing promise.Now, Fields hopes to establish himself as a franchise quarterback in New York. The 26-year-old recognizes the significance of Glenn‚Äôs faith in him, particularly given Detroit's recent success under Glenn‚Äôs defensive leadership."Our relationship playing against each other means a lot because Detroit, of course, they've had a lot of success the past couple of years," Fields said. "So for [Glenn] to want me here is definitely an honor, and I'm going to put it all on the line for him and do all I can to help this team be successful."Fields‚Äô arrival in New York also means reuniting with wide receiver Garrett Wilson, his former Ohio State teammate. The two shared a productive connection in college, and Fields will likely lean on that familiarity to ease his transition. Additionally, Chad Mougey, now part of the Jets‚Äô front office, was in Denver when Fields torched the Broncos for a career-high 335 yards and four touchdowns in 2023 ‚Äî a performance that undoubtedly left a strong impression.Fields‚Äô dual-threat ability remains one of his most valuable assets. Last season with the Steelers, he completed 106 of 161 passes (65.8%) for 1,106 yards, five touchdowns, and just one interception in 10 games (six starts). He also rushed for 289 yards and five touchdowns on 62 carries, showcasing his versatility despite limited playing time.With 7,780 career passing yards, 45 passing touchdowns, 31 interceptions, and an additional 2,509 rushing yards and 19 touchdowns in 50 games (44 starts), Fields‚Äô stats reflect both his potential and the challenges he‚Äôs faced. The Jets now hope Fields can follow in the footsteps of quarterbacks like Baker Mayfield and Geno Smith ‚Äî players who found stability and success after early career struggles.Also Read: Travis Kelce shares a heartfelt compliment about Taylor Swift on his podcast For Fields, this opportunity with the Jets represents more than just another chapter; it‚Äôs a chance to prove he belongs among the NFL‚Äôs elite. Under Glenn‚Äôs guidance and with a more stable environment, Fields may finally have the platform he needs to thrive.
Article Summary: Justin fields has signed a 2-year deal with the new york jets. The 26-year-old quarterback played for the pittsburgh steelers last season. He was drafted 11th overall in 2021, but struggled to establish himself in the nfl. The jets hope fields can follow in the footsteps of quarterbacks like geno smith.

Article Title: Donald Trump administration freezes $175 million in federal funds for University of Pennsylvania over transgender policy
Article Text: US President Donald Trump's administration has suspended roughly $175 million in federal funding for the University of Pennsylvania, citing concerns over transgender participation in women's sports, the White House announced Wednesday.The decision follows President Donald Trump's February 5 executive order barring transgender athletes from competing in girls' and women's sports. The day after signing the order, the department of education launched an investigation into Penn's swimming program, focusing on transgender swimmer Lia Thomas, who last competed for the school in 2022.However, the White House clarified that the suspension of federal funds came from a separate review of discretionary federal money allocated to universities. The frozen funds originated from the department of defense and the department of health and human services.A spokesperson for Penn said the university had not been notified about the funding suspension."It is important to note, however, that Penn has always followed NCAA and Ivy League policies regarding student participation on athletic teams," said Ron Ozio, Penn's spokesperson. "We have been in the past, and remain today, in full compliance with the regulations that apply to not only Penn, but all of our NCAA and Ivy League peer institutions."The education department's office for civil rights is investigating whether Penn violated Title IX, the federal law prohibiting sex-based discrimination in education, by allowing Thomas to compete. Thomas, the first openly transgender athlete to win a Division I title, swam for Penn's women's team before graduating in 2022.At the time, the NCAA permitted transgender athletes to compete under guidelines set by individual sports' national governing bodies, international federations, or the International Olympic Committee. Thomas met the requirements, which allowed transgender women to compete after one year of hormone replacement therapy.Trump's executive order, however, mandates that federal agencies can withhold funding from institutions that do not follow the administration's interpretation of Title IX‚Äîdefining "sex" strictly as the gender assigned at birth.In response to the order, the NCAA swiftly altered its policy, eliminating the sport-by-sport approach and implementing a blanket rule that restricts women's sports to athletes assigned female at birth.The University of Pennsylvania is not the only institution under scrutiny. The department of education has also launched investigations into San Jose State University's volleyball program and the Massachusetts Interscholastic Athletic Association as part of a broader effort to enforce the administration's stance on transgender participation in athletics.
Article Summary: The white house has suspended roughly $175 million in federal funding for the university of pennsylvania. The decision follows president donald trump's executive order barring transgender athletes from competing in girls' and women's sports. The department of education has launched an investigation into penn's swimming program, focusing on transgender swimmer lia thomas.

Article Title: Did Kate Middleton and Prince William miss special family celebration with Pippa Middleton?
Article Text: Princess of Wales Kate Middleton and Prince William attended the Six Nations match between England and Wales at the Principality Stadium in Cardiff on Saturday, possibly missing a special family event‚ÄîKate's niece Grace Matthews' fourth birthday.Grace is the daughter of Kate‚Äôs sister, Pippa Middleton , and her husband, James Matthews.According to GB News, Kate's attendance at the match indicates she may have missed Grace‚Äôs birthday celebrations. While the details remain unconfirmed, Grace is likely to enjoy the special day in Berkshire with her siblings, six-year-old Arthur and two-year-old Rose.Kate and Prince William, both avid rugby fans, were at the stadium in their official roles as patrons of their respective rugby unions.Kate, as patron of England‚Äôs Rugby Football Union and the Rugby Football League, was in the stands at Twickenham supporting England, while Prince William, Patron of the Welsh Rugby Union, was cheering on Wales."A pleasure to meet with players supported by the Welsh Rugby Charitable Trust ahead of today‚Äôs match in Cardiff," the Prince and Princess of Wales said in a post on X.Prior to the match, they visited injured players supported by the Welsh Rugby Charitable Trust in the Sir Tasker Watkins Suite, a designated area at the Stadium for injured players and their families.The Welsh Rugby Charitable Trust, established in 1972, focuses on providing education, social support, and sporting opportunities for rugby players who have suffered serious injuries.
Article Summary: Kate middleton and prince william attended the six nations match between england and wales at the principality stadium in cardiff on saturday. Kate may have missed her niece grace matthews' fourth birthday. Grace is the daughter of kate's sister, pippa middleton, and her husband, james matthews.

Article Title: Shattering records and cultivating future stars
Article Text:
Mayura Shanbaug

Ashish Kumar Srivastava - MD and CEO of PNB MetLife

Sameer Bansal - Chief Distribution Officer of PNB MetLife

Chirag Shetty - Asian Games Gold Medalist & JBC 2023 mentor

Satwiksairaj Rankireddy - Asian Games Gold Medalist & JBC 2023 mentor

Disclaimer: Content Produced by PNB Metlife

The 7th PNB MetLife Junior Badminton Championship shattered records with over 8,200 young talent nationwide, earning global recognition and fostering a culture of resilience and determination in aspiring badminton starsIn a spectacular display of badminton prowess and youthful enthusiasm, the 7th edition of the PNB MetLife Junior Badminton Championship (JBC) etched its name in the annals of sporting history. Celebrating a staggering participation of 8257 young champions from across India, the championship not only broke its own record set in 2022 but also clinched the title of the ‚ÄòMost kids participating in a Badminton Championship in multiple cities‚Äô as recognised by the World Record Certification Agency (WRCA).The grand finale unfolded at the Indira Gandhi Indoor Stadium in New Delhi, where the air was thick with competition, camaraderie, and the unmistakable passion for badminton. The event, graced by chief guests Chirag Shetty and Satwik Rankireddy, Asian Games Gold Medalists and JBC 2023 mentors, was a true celebration of the sport‚Äôs rising stars.The 10-city extravaganza, spanning the length and breadth of the country, showcased the unwavering commitment of PNB MetLife in nurturing young talents in the badminton arena. With participants exceeding 8200, it‚Äôs evident that the PNB MetLife JBC has become a beacon for aspiring shuttlers, highlighting the deep-seated passion for badminton among the diverse and talented youth of India.Beyond the glitz and glamour of the record-breaking numbers, the championship holds a special place in the hearts of those at the helm. Ashish Kumar Srivastava, MD and CEO of PNB MetLife, expressed pride in not just surpassing their own world record but also in contributing to India‚Äôs glory on the international badminton stage. The championship, he emphasized, is not merely a competition but a significant milestone in creating a pan-India badminton ecosystem.This edition of the JBC saw a strategic partnership with world champions Chirag Shetty and Satwiksairaj Rankireddy, who served as mentors for the young talents. Sameer Bansal, Chief Distribution Officer of PNB MetLife, acknowledged the pivotal role played by these champions in inspiring the next generation of badminton stars. The focus, according to Bansal, is on unleashing the latent potential of young shuttlers and preparing them for global excellence.The Delhi chapter of the championship witnessed some nail-biting action with over 1000 participants competing fiercely across various categories. From Ananya Talyan‚Äôs stellar performance in Girls Singles Under 9 to Divyansh Rawat‚Äôs triumph in Boys Singles Under 17, the young talents left no shuttle unturned in their quest for victory.The results from the Delhi leg not only showcased the raw talent but also highlighted the championship‚Äôs commitment to breaking barriers. The PNB MetLife Junior Badminton Championship is not just about records; it‚Äôs about fostering a culture of healthy living, determination, and resilience among the future champions of the sport.In the words of Satwiksairaj Rankireddy, the championship serves as an invaluable platform.---------------------------------------------------------------As we celebrate the successful culmination of the 7th edition of PNB MetLife Junior Badminton Championship , we take pride in surpassing our own world record for highest participation and for being recognized by World Record Certification Agency. Beyond the records, JBC represents a significant milestone in our mission to lay the groundwork for India‚Äô s glory and success on the international badminton stage by creating a pan-India badminton ecosystem that nurtures champions at the grassroots levelThis year has been especially remarkable for PNB MetLife JBC as we joined hands with world champions Chirag Shetty and Satwiksairaj Rankireddy as JBC Mentors for the young talents associated with this tournament. They have played a pivotal role in inspiring young shuttlers to dream big and elevate their game and skills. We are eager for the next edition to unfold in our journey of unveiling the latent badminton potential across our nation and preparing them for global excellenceIt‚Äôs inspiring to witness the boundless talent and enthusiasm within our young athletes. My journey as JBC mentor has been incredibly fulfilling, as I got the opportunity to guide these budding champions and witness the journey of these young badminton stars. This championship is more than a competition; it is a platform that nurtures dreams, ignites aspirations, and, I believe, it is laying the foundation for future gold medalists in the makingTournaments like these serve as an invaluable platform for nurturing and harnessing the potential of our country‚Äôs young badminton stars. Witnessing the enthusiasm, passion, and skill displayed by these emerging shuttlers reinforces the belief that our country has an immense reservoir of talent. My association as a JBC mentor has been a source of immense pride, particularly given the role that the championship is playing in creating an incredible platform that is serving as a powerful catalyst, empowering young players and bolstering their confidence to become future champions
Article Summary: The 7th pnb metlife junior badminton championship shattered records with over 8,200 young talent nationwide. The grand finale unfolded at the indira gandhi indoor stadium in new delhi, where the air was thick with competition, camaraderie, and the unmistakable passion for badminton.

The much-anticipated RCB Unbox Event 2025 has started at the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru. This event has become an annual tradition for the Royal Challengers Bangalore (RCB) franchise, serving as the official curtain-raiser for their Indian Premier League (IPL) campaign. First introduced in 2022, the RCB Unbox event is a grand celebration where the team unveils its new jersey, introduces the squad to fans, and inducts legends into the RCB Hall of Fame.This year‚Äôs edition promises an exciting lineup of performances, appearances by star players, and several surprises. The event will also provide fans with an opportunity to interact with their favorite cricketers and experience the electrifying atmosphere of the Chinnaswamy Stadium. With speculation surrounding the potential induction of Dinesh Karthik into the Hall of Fame, fans have another reason to look forward to this event.Fans who are unable to attend the event in person can still catch the action live. The event will be streamed exclusively on:For those looking to experience the event live at the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium, tickets can be purchased online.Ticket booking details:Fans are advised to book their tickets early, as the event is expected to be sold out quickly due to high demand.The RCB Unbox event is not just about cricket; it is a full-fledged entertainment spectacle featuring live performances, jersey launches, player interactions, and special ceremonies. Some of the key highlights include:RCB will officially unveil their IPL 2025 jersey, a moment eagerly awaited by fans. This will mark the first time the players step out in their new colors ahead of the upcoming season.The complete RCB men‚Äôs and women‚Äôs squads will be introduced in front of the fans. This will be the first chance for supporters to see their new signings along with retained players.One of the most emotional moments of the event is the RCB Hall of Fame induction. In 2022, AB de Villiers and Chris Gayle were honored, while R Vinay Kumar joined them in 2023. This year, speculations suggest that Dinesh Karthik might be inducted, recognizing his contributions to the franchise before his retirement and new role as RCB's batting coach.A major attraction of RCB Unbox is the live music and entertainment lineup featuring some of the biggest names. The performers for RCB Unbox 2025 include:These artists will set the stage on fire with high-energy performances, adding to the vibrant atmosphere of the event.Several star cricketers will be present at the RCB Unbox event. Some of the key players expected to attend include:Additionally, the RCB Women‚Äôs team is also likely to make an appearance at the event, adding to the excitement for fans.
Article Summary: The much-anticipated rcb unbox event 2025 has started at the m. chinnaswamy stadium in bengaluru. The event has become an annual tradition for the royal challengers bangalore (rcb) franchise, serving as the official curtain-raiser for their indian premier league (ipl) campaign.

Article Title: Book IPL 2025 tickets online: Check IPL tickets prices, booking platform, match schedule, and other details

Book IPL tickets 2025 online and offline: Everything you need to know

Visit the booking website ‚Äì Go to any of the ticketing platforms such as BookMyShow, Paytm Insider, IPLT20.com, or TicketGenie.

Select the match ‚Äì Choose the specific IPL match from the available list.

Choose seating category ‚Äì Select a seating option from categories ranging from General to VIP.

Proceed to checkout ‚Äì Enter personal details like name, email, and phone number.

Make the payment ‚Äì Choose a payment method (debit/credit card, UPI, net banking) and complete the transaction.

Receive confirmation ‚Äì A confirmation SMS and email with ticket details will be sent after successful booking.

Stadium box offices: Fans can visit the box offices located at the stadiums hosting IPL matches to buy tickets directly. These box offices usually open a few days prior to the match and provide fans the opportunity to purchase tickets for specific games. This option is ideal for those who want to choose their seats personally or avoid online bookings.

Authorised retail outlets: IPL tickets are also available through a network of authorized retail outlets situated in various cities. These outlets are officially recognized by the IPL and offer fans a physical location to purchase tickets. Whether it‚Äôs a dedicated retail store or a partner outlet, these locations offer a hands-on alternative for those who prefer buying tickets in person.

With just a few days remaining for the much-anticipated 18th edition of the Indian Premier League (IPL 2025), the excitement among cricket fans is already at its peak. The tournament will commence at the iconic Eden Gardens in Kolkata, with defending champions Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) facing Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) in the opening match on March 22.As the tournament draws closer, fans are eager to secure their seats for the thrilling matches. Online ticket booking for IPL 2025 has already begun through various platforms, offering different price categories based on seating preferences.Listed below are details on ticket booking platforms, steps to book IPL tickets online, pricing, and stadium-wise ticket details to help fans prepare for the cricketing extravaganza.Booking IPL tickets online is a simple process.
